definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: hurt, pain, grieve (NH Nithp. and in deriv.; Targum [[עֲחַב]] be in pain(rare); Eth.9as’aba: be hard, difficult, Lag:BN 50, cf. 201 cp. Ar. gad.iba be angry, but dub.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[עֲחָבוֹ]] 1Ki 1:6 his father had not pained him (LXX Klo Gr [[עֲחָרוֹ]], but v. Benz); ins. [[עָחַב]] (with other words) 2Sa 13:21 LXX Ew Th We Kit Bu HPS; Inf. cstr. sf. [[לְבִלְתִּי עָחְבִּי]] 1Ch 4:10 that  it ([[רָעָה]]) may not pain me; Pt. pass. cstr. [[עֲחוּבַת רוּחַ]] Is 54:6 hurt in spirit (of Zion under fig. of deserted wife).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נֶעְחַב]] 1Sa 20:24 be pained for ([[אֶל]] pers.; del. LXX HPS); [[נֶעֱחַב]] 2Sa 19:3 the king is in pain (is grieving) for ([[עַל]] pers.); Impf. 3 ms. [[יֵעָחֵב]] 1Sa 20:3 lest he be pained; + [[בָּהֶם]] instr. Ec 10:9 shall be hurt by them (i.e. [[אֲבָנִים]]; only here of physical pain); 2 mpl. [[תֵּעָֽחְבוּ]] Ge 45:5 be not grieved (+ [[יִחַר]]; sq. [[כִּי]] that ye sold me), cf. Ne 8:10, Ne 8:11 (abs.) do not grieve.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[עִצְּבוּ]] c. acc. Is 63:10 they vexed his holy spirit (+ [[מָרוּ]]); Impf. 3 mpl. [[בְּבָרַי יְעַצֵָּבוּ]] Ps 56:6 my affairs they vex (Thes al.), but improb., < Che ´[[בְּדָבָר יְע]] with speech they vex (me).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. sf. [[יַעֲחִיבוּהוּ]] Ps 78:40 they used to cause him [´[[י]]] pain.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּתְעַצֵּב אֶל־לִבּוֹ]] Ge 6:6 and he was vexed to his heart (of ´[[י]]; ‖[[וַיִּנׇּחֶם]]); 3 mpl. [[וִיִּתְעַצְּבוּ]] Ge 34:7 (+ [[וַיִּחַר]], sq. clause with [[כִּי]]).
